publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1392 Maureen Macmillan: Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club-That the Parliament regrets the decision that Inverness Caledonian Thistle FC loses out in its bid to ground-share with Aberdeen Football Club and as a result is denied promotion to the Scottish Premier League (SPL), despite winning the Scottish Football League First Division Championship; notes the SPL's in-principle agreement for clubs elsewhere in Scotland to ground-share; further notes that the SPL is currently reviewing rules on stadia criteria; urges the SPL to give clubs a sufficient opportunity to fulfil such criteria, and calls for fair treatment for all clubs and their supporters across Scotland.

S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Sarah Boyack*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Eleanor Scott*, Pauline McNeill*, Ms Sandra White*, Fergus Ewing*, Scott Barrie*, Robin Harper*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Jim Mather*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mike Pringle*, Alex Johnstone*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Richard Baker*

S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*, Phil Gallie*, Dennis Canavan*, Rob Gibson*, Trish Godman*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-1392 Maureen Macmillan: Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club-That the Parliament regrets the decision that Inverness Caledonian Thistle FC loses out in its bid to ground-share with Aberdeen Football Club and as a result is denied promotion to the Scottish Premier League (SPL), despite winning the Scottish Football League First Division Championship; notes the SPL's in-principle agreement for clubs elsewhere in Scotland to ground-share; further notes that the SPL is currently reviewing rules on stadia criteria; urges the SPL to give clubs a sufficient opportunity to fulfil such criteria, and calls for fair treatment for all clubs and their supporters across Scotland. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Sarah Boyack, Brian Adam, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Jamie Stone, Eleanor Scott, Pauline McNeill, Fergus Ewing, Scott Barrie, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Jim Mather, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mike Pringle, Alex Johnstone, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bristow Muldoon, Mrs Nanette Milne, Richard Baker, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Richard Lochhead, John Farquhar Munro, Mary Scanlon, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Dennis Canavan, Rob Gibson, Trish Godman, Campbell Martin, Mr John Home Robertson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mark Ballard*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Susan Deacon*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1392 Inverness Caledonian Thistle Football Club (lodged on 1 June 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
